mapper.select: select count(B_NO) as b_no from s_board

select rn, STUDY_NO as study_no, LIST_NAME as list_name, B_NO as b_no, B_WRITE_DAY as b_write_day, B_WRITER as b_writer, B_TITLE as b_title, B_CONTENT as b_content, B_HIT as b_hit from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by study_no asc) rn, STUDY_NO , LIST_NAME , B_NO , B_WRITE_DAY , B_WRITER , B_TITLE , B_CONTENT , B_HIT from s_board order by B_NO asc ) where rn<=#{end} and rn >=#{start}
select B_NO as b_no, B_WRITE_DAY as b_write_day, B_WRITER as b_writer, B_TITLE as b_title, B_CONTENT as b_content, B_HIT as b_hit from s_board where B_NO = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into s_board (STUDY_NO, LIST_NAME, B_NO, B_WRITE_DAY, B_WRITER, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIT) values (20, '게시판', board_seq.NEXTVAL, sysdate, 'cj', #{b_title}, #{b_content}, 3)
mapper.select: select max(B_NO) from s_board where B_WRITER = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE s_board SET B_CONTENT= #{b_content}, B_TITLE=#{b_title}, B_WRITE_DAY=sysdate WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
mapper.select: select B_NO as b_no, RE_NO as re_no, RE_WRITER as re_writer, RE_WRITER_NO as re_writer_no, RE_WRITER_DAY as re_writer_day, RE_CONTENT as re_content from S_BOARD_REPLY where B_NO = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into S_BOARD_REPLY(B_NO, RE_NO, RE_WRITER, RE_WRITER_NO, RE_WRITER_DAY, RE_CONTENT) values (#{b_no}, 3, 'cj', 2, sysdate, #{re_content} )
